creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: head and shoulders of an old woman wearing a large fabric headdress and a garment with a fur lined collar; facing to the R of the picture plane
marks:
Signature

in graphite on verso: B.355 II / H 82 monogram in plate, upper left: [Rt 163]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Bust of an Old Woman in Furred Cloak and Heavy Headdress
